summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account during March 2019. It includes information about deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest accrued, highlighting significant transactions including large fund transfers.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial statement from Deutsche Bank, which details his account activities.

events.title: Beginning Balance Statement
events.description: The statement begins with a balance of $512,121,318.85 as of March 1, 2019.

events.title: Funds Transfer
events.description: A funds transfer of $10,000,000.00 was made from Epstein's account.

events.title: Closing Interest Accrued
events.description: Interest of $58,723.73 was accrued and moved to principal.

events.title: Withdrawal
events.description: A withdrawal of $8,723.73 was made from Epstein's account.

events.title: Ending Balance Statement
events.description: The ending balance as of March 31, 2019, was $0.00 after various transactions.

keyFacts: The document details Jeffrey Epstein's account balance and transactions for March 2019.
The beginning balance on March 1, 2019, was $512,121,318.85.
A significant funds transfer of $10,000,000.00 occurred on March 12, 2019.
Interest accrued during the month totaled $58,723.73.
The ending balance as of March 31, 2019, was $0.00 after various transactions.
